caption: The image features a purple background with a gold design. The main focus of the image is the text "DAY 20" in gold, which is positioned towards the top left of the image. Below the "DAY 20" text, there is another line of text that reads "May this blessed Ramadan nourishes the seeds of good deeds." The combination of the purple background, gold design, and the text creates a visually appealing and meaningful image.
texts: May this blessed Ramadan nourishes the seeds of good deeds
